findings.title: Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code can make a contract more difficult to understand and maintain, and can also increase the size of the contract and the cost of deploying and interacting with it.

findings.title: Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The ^ symbol indicates that any version of Solidity that is compatible with the specified version can be used to compile the contract, which may produce vulnerabilities and undiscovered bugs.
findings.location: BlueBird.sol#L9, L174, L205, L287, L315, L633, L672
